issue.title: [Java] Explore using Avatica as basis for Flight JDBC Driver
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7756](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7756). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Explore using Avatica as basis for Flight JDBC Driver to see how suitable it is compared to building the JDBC driver from the ground up.
